title: Arena skin from TFT not unlocked?
body: So I unlocked the Arrowhead Arena by leveling up to level two. But it still says it's locked? What's going on? Is this a known bug?

replies.body:
Happened to me too, tried everything to fix it. Is it just OCE this is happening to?

Edit: I ran a full repair on the client and that seemed to work in unlocking them.
I have this same bug. Don't know what to do exacly{{item:3070}}

So there's been a fair few people experiencing the same issue, with the arena skins not being usable immediately after unlocking. Generally, they seem to become available within about 24 hours, so it may just be a matter of being patient. If you still haven't got access to them within about 24 hours of unlocking them, you should submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and let them know about the issue, and hopefully they'll be able to help.

Not sure if this is your issue but:

After you get level two, it'll give you an egg and you choose which of the 3 skins you want inside of it. You still have to go to the loot/chest tab from the home screen, and open it like a chest before you'll get it. I know a few of my friends (and myself) who haven't played league in a while and weren't familiar with the chest system had this issue.
